summary: This document is a letter from Amanda Kirby confirming that Jeffrey Epstein is the sole member and owner of NES, LLC, a New York limited liability company formed in 1998. The letter serves as a formal acknowledgment of Epstein's ownership without the need for an Operating Agreement at the time of formation.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the sender of the letter confirming Jeffrey Epstein's ownership of NES, LLC.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the sole member and owner of NES, LLC.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is communicating with Jeffrey Epstein regarding his ownership of NES, LLC.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27Â° P1, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby confirms Jeffrey Epstein as the sole member of NES, LLC.
NES, LLC was formed in 1998 as a single member LLC.
An Operating Agreement was not necessary at the time of NES, LLC's formation.
